Uses of Class
org.transitime.core.SpatialMatch

  • Packages that use SpatialMatch 
    Package Description
    org.transitime.core
    Contains the core classes that process the AVL data and create predictions, arrival/departure times, headway, etc.

    • Uses of SpatialMatch in org.transitime.core

      Subclasses of SpatialMatch in org.transitime.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TemporalMatch 
      Methods in org.transitime.core that return SpatialMatch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SpatialMatch SpatialMatch.getMatchAfterStop()
      Returns a SpatialMatch that corresponds to the the current match but will be moved to after a stop if the current match is just before the stop.
      SpatialMatch SpatialMatch.getMatchAtNextStop()
      Returns a SpatialMatch that corresponds to the next stop.
      SpatialMatch SpatialMatch.getMatchAtPreviousStop()
      Returns a SpatialMatch that corresponds to the previous stop.
      SpatialMatch SpatialMatch.getMatchBeforeStop()
      Returns a SpatialMatch that corresponds to the current match but will be moved to before a stop if the current match is just after the stop.
      Methods in org.transitime.core that return types with arguments of type SpatialMatch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<SpatialMatch> SpatialMatcher.getSpatialMatches(AvlReport avlReport, java.util.List<Trip> tripsToInvestigate, Block block)
      Goes through the Block assignment data and determines the closest spatial matches.
      static java.util.List<SpatialMatch> SpatialMatcher.getSpatialMatches(VehicleState vehicleState)
      Starts at the previous match and goes from that point forward through the block assignment looking for the best spatial matches.
      Methods in org.transitime.core with parameters of type SpatialMatch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int TravelTimes.expectedTravelTimeBetweenMatches(java.lang.String vehicleId, java.util.Date time, SpatialMatch match1, SpatialMatch match2)
      Determines expected travel time in msec between the two matches based on the travel times from the database.
      int TravelTimes.expectedTravelTimeBetweenMatches(java.lang.String vehicleId, int timeOfDaySecs, SpatialMatch match1, SpatialMatch match2)
      Determines expected travel time in msec between the two matches based on the travel times from the database.
      Method parameters in org.transitime.core with type arguments of type SpatialMatch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TemporalMatch TemporalMatcher.getBestTemporalMatch(VehicleState vehicleState, java.util.List<SpatialMatch> spatialMatches)
      For the spatial matches passed in determines the one that temporally makes the most sense.
      TemporalMatch TemporalMatcher.getBestTemporalMatchComparedToSchedule(AvlReport avlReport, java.util.List<SpatialMatch> spatialMatches)
      From the list of spatial matches passed in, determines which one has the best valid temporal match.
      Constructors in org.transitime.core with parameters of type SpatialMatch 
      Constructor and Description
      SpatialMatch(SpatialMatch toCopy, org.transitime.core.Indices newIndices, double distanceAlongSegment)
      Constructs a new SpatialMatch but at the new indices specified.
